latest.title: Cancellation - Bigblu Broadband plc
latest.content:
18 Dec 2025 07:00
RNS Number : 0009M
AIM
18 December 2025
NOTICE
18/12/2025 - 07:00
NOTICE OF CANCELLATION OF ADMISSION TO TRADING ON AIM
At the request of the company the following securities have been cancelled from trading on AIM with effect from the time and date of this notice.
BIGBLU BROADBAND PLC
2138008P6X5EX455KU41
ORDINARY SHARES OF 15P EACH, FULLY PAID
(BD5JMP1)(GB00BD5JMP10)
BIGU BROA/PAR VTG FPD 0.15
If you have any queries or require further information, please contact the company's nominated adviser.

latest.title: Result of General Meeting
latest.content:
20 Dec 2024 09:35
RNS Number : 9354Q
Bigblu Broadband PLC
20 December 2024
Bigblu Broadband plc
('BBB', the 'Company' or the 'Group')
Proposed sale of SkyMesh Pty Ltd
Result of General Meeting
Bigblu Broadband plc (AIM: BBB.L), a leading provider of super-fast and ultrafast broadband services, is delighted to announce that at the Company's General Meeting held today, the Resolution put to shareholders to approve the proposed sale of SkyMesh Pty Ltd was duly passed.
Completion of the Disposal is expected to occur in the next few days.
For further information:
Bigblu Broadband Group PLC
www.bbb-plc.com
Frank Waters, Chief Executive Officer
Cavendish Capital Markets Limited (Nomad and Broker)
Marc Milmo / Finn Gordon (Corporate Finance)
Tim Redfern / Harriet Ward (Corporate Broking)
Tel: +44 (0)20 7220 0500
This information is provided by RNS, the news service of the London Stock Exchange. RNS is approved by the Financial Conduct Authority to act as a Primary Information Provider in the United Kingdom.
